original_text:
I will break the gate-bar of Damascus,
    and cut off the inhabitants from the Valley of Aven,
and him who holds the scepter from Beth-eden;
    and the people of Syria shall go into exile to Kir,”
says the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 다메섹의 빗장을 꺾으며 아웬 골짜기에서 그 주민들을 끊으며 벧에덴에서 규 잡은 자를 끊으리니 아람 백성이 사로잡혀 기르에 이르리라 여호와께서 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will break the gate-bar of Damascus
and cut off the inhabitants from the Valley of Aven
and him who holds the scepter from Beth-eden
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 벧에덴에서 홀을 잡은 자도 끊겠다

sentences.original_text: and the people of Syria shall go into exile to Kir
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아람 사람은 기르로 사로잡혀 가리라
